entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:16 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 10:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -20.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -23.5°C
Wind: WSW 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
